summary: This module integrates Langchain’s tracing and generation mechanisms with the Chainlit UI. It provides helpers to accumulate streamed tokens for final answers, format generation data into JSON‑compatible structures, and a tracer implementation that records run lifecycles, maintains parent‑child relationships, captures errors, and forwards updates to Chainlit steps and messages.
business_intent: Allow developers to monitor, debug, and display Langchain execution flows and model outputs in real‑time within Chainlit applications, improving observability and user interaction with LLM-powered workflows.
